author: Kálmán Bencze
comment: The app is OK, works good, but the favorites need to be redesigned in my opinion. Full screen photos and the name written over it because the list view has too tiny pictures. Sometimes the favorites don't load up. I, personally would appreciate it, and I think others too with round watches. And one last thing: when in a call, it would be nice to have the ability to swipe left or right to hang up. Found only one bug: when entering the app, it re-calls the last person who was called with the app
title: Redesign favorites list for round watches

author: Madhukanth Reddy
comment: I have installed this app. I am using LG G smart watch. When i tried opening this, it says no contacts even though i have contacts on my mobile. Even i  tried sync contacts but no use. Please let me know how to proceed or kindly refund the amount. Thanks  ..   Yes , I have favourite contacts. Its not even showing that. I am using Samsung Galaxy S3 phone

reply.author: Uladzimir Klyshevich
reply.content: App display only favorites contacts. Do you have favorites contacts in your phone?

title: Does not work
